parser.commentExpr: (?x) # free-spacing (see `RegEx - Pattern Modifiers`) (?s: # Multi Line Comment (nesting allowed) \{- # - start-of-comment indicator (?> # - followed by zero or more characters... [^{-] # ...not part of ******* start indicator, | \{(?!-) # ...not being ******* start-of-comment indicator, | -(?!\}) # ...not being an end-of-comment indicator and | (?R) # ...balancing through recursion (nesting) )* -\} # - end-of-comment indicator ) | (?m-s:-{2}.*?$) # Single Line Comment
